alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 27 at 2:47PM AKST until March 01 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow reducing visibility to near zero at times. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions will spread to the Bering Strait coast by late Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
